title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Blended Learning Design Strategies for Middle School Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Theoretical knowledge of physical education and instructional design fundamentals
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design blended learning middle school physical education lesson plans integrating online/offline elements
Learners can analyze technology integration effects in physical education using multi-criteria evaluation methods
Learners develop activity-based learning scenarios considering middle school students' developmental stage characteristics (physical, cognitive, social)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
